tool.name: FuzzyDiff
tool.description: Compares two files, tolerating numeric differences.
tool.command:
FuzzyDiff
#if $param_in1: -in1 $param_in1 #end if #if $param_in2: -in2 $param_in2 #end if #if $param_ratio: -ratio $param_ratio #end if #if $param_absdiff: -absdiff $param_absdiff #end if #if $param_verbose: -verbose $param_verbose #end if #if $param_tab_width: -tab_width $param_tab_width #end if #if $param_first_column: -first_column $param_first_column #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced':
#if $rep_param_whitelist: -whitelist #for token in $rep_param_whitelist: #if " " in str(token): "$token.param_whitelist" #else $token.param_whitelist #end if #end for #end if
#if $rep_param_matched_whitelist: -matched_whitelist #for token in $rep_param_matched_whitelist: #if " " in str(token): "$token.param_matched_whitelist" #else $token.param_matched_whitelist #end if #end for #end if #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #end if > $param_stdout

param.name: param_ratio
param.label: acceptable relative erro
param.help: (-ratio) Only one of 'ratio' or 'absdiff' has to be satisfied. Use "absdiff" to deal with cases like "zero vs. epsilon"

param.name: param_absdiff
param.label: acceptable absolute difference
param.help: (-absdiff) Only one of 'ratio' or 'absdiff' has to be satisfied.

param.name: param_verbose
param.label:
set verbose level:
0 = very quiet mode (absolutely no output)
1 = quiet mode (no output unless differences detected)
2 = default (include summary at end)
3 = continue after errors

param.name: param_tab_width
param.label: tabulator width, used for calculation of column numbers

param.name: param_first_column
param.label: number of first column, used for calculation of column numbers

param.name: param_whitelist
param.label: Lines containing one of these strings are skipped

param.name: param_matched_whitelist
param.label: Lines where one file contains one string and the other file another string are skipped. Input is given as list of colon separated tuples,

tool.help:
Compares two files, tolerating numeric differences.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/UTILS_FuzzyDiff.html
